alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:47AM EST until January 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Connecticut and the Mid Hudson Valley, southern Taconics, and western Greene County in east central New York. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could be around half an inch per hour at times this afternoon and evening. Snow will turn to rain this evening, with some light freezing rain possible above 1000 feet elevation. Gusty winds this evening could result in isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
